channel.title: Serious prob
channel.description:
someone help me out this is a completely new problem...................... i have never had this happen till now......................... items are there but they r [b]INVISIBLE[/b]...... can you believe that??? i got th codes rite and everything and no errors but when i go try it out i go to shop i just added and the items in there are all invisible except for harpoon...... (other stuff in shop r lobby pot, fishing rod, fly fishing rod, feathers, other fishing stuff......)
also when i am fishing i get the item everything works but the item that i get is invisible.............
***but the item works perfectly still though*** ***but when you log out and back in item is gone***.................
can you pro coders out there tell me how to fix this??? Thank you.................
